text: Gonzalo Agustín Vega González (November 29, 1946 – October 10, 2016) was a Mexican film, theatre and television actor. == Personal life == He was also father of the actresses Zuria Vega, Marimar Vega and a son, Gonzalo Vega Jr. In 2010 he was diagnosed with preleukemia and retired from acting.
